Articles.Content:
Having to play with the aerospike to get it to connect was an annoyance, so I fixed it.

Just a .cfg hack, but it resolves the issue. The file (parts.cfg) resolves the top attach issue.

edit: I saw a forum request for a bottom attach option so I added that file also (this file is named parts.cfg.txt, just remove the ".txt" from the name before using it) The spike nests nicely hidden inside a 1m stock decoupler.

I take no credit for the parts, I only edited the parts.cfg files.

Figured I'd share...

Edited August 14, 2012 by CrashnBurn
added bottom attach option, fixed forum upgrade format errors
Thanks a lot! Now I can finally have my spikes on the 3rd peel of my onion.
